publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4725 Richard Lochhead: The Singleton of Dufftown Malt Whisky—That the Parliament congratulates Dufftown Distillery in Moray as it launches the latest Speyside malt, The Singleton of Dufftown; welcomes its traditional 19th century bottle and labelling which pay homage to Scotland’s whisky heritage; notes that Speyside malts are held in high regard throughout the world, and recognises the vital role which whisky plays in the Moray and Scottish economies, providing 41,000 jobs and contributing £2 billion a year to the balance of trade.
S2M-4725 The Singleton of Dufftown Malt Whisky (lodged on 25 August 2006) Linda Fabiani*
